inclusion.criterion: total or partial penile loss as a complication from ritual circumcision
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing and able to provide written, informed consent
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Immunosuppression (HIV positive, diabetes mellitus or drugs affecting immune response)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active tuberculosis (TB) or a history of TB
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Disorders of circulation (e.g. peripheral vascular disease, vasculitis)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Renal failure and not on a renal replacement programme
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Systemic disease deemed by the investigator serious enough to preclude the use of immunosuppression agents
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Wilson disease, which may be a contraindication for immunosuppression. However, the patient's aggressive behavior and history of tremors since a year ago suggest potential mental health issues.
